channel.title: Betaflight on Betaflight.tech Site
channel.description: Recent content in Betaflight on Betaflight.tech Site

item.title: Betaflight 3.3 Advanced filters
item.description: Betaflight 3.3 Release will be ready for March 1st. New feature : Advanced filters New advanced filters have been added to Betaflight 3.3. Advanced filters are not working with all flight controllers and must be activate with caution. Fast Kalman has been replaced by Biquad RC+FIR2. It s now more easy to activate and use. You just need to specify cutoff Hz parameter directly. Flightcontroller with F4 processor is advised.

item.title: Downloads
item.description: 1. Betaflight Firmwares Binaries firmwares files can be downloaded with the configurator or here You can compile your own firmware binary, modify and get sources here 2. Betaflight Configurator Binaries of the Configurator can be downloaded here You can also compile your own configurator, get and modify sources here 3. Betaflight Blackbox Explorer The easiest way to get the explorer (if you have Google Chrome) is to install it from the Chrome Web Store
